column5: Well my Christmas present came a little early.The wife And I headed over to BPS to do some Christmas shopping.Well she ended up buying me an ice hut.Its the Clam Guide.Thanks to all the suggestions in the other post.They had a great deal on them reg $564.00 for $349.00.So now bring on the ice. But I have one small problem I still have my 2 man homemade hut to get rid of.Its in great shape and served us well.I really hate to see it go.But its got to go! So if any one needs a portable 2  man hut come and get it.    I T S    F R E E.

congrats on the new hut and thats very nice of you to give away the ice hut, i'm sure it will serve someone well.. I'm just too lazy to pull out a sled onto the ice, so i'll watch the days that i do go on the ice...  once again, congrats Dan!   kevin
Does yer hut yer sellin, the old one, fold down or collapse?
it folds down to about 14inc.Its 4 ft by 6 ft and its on skis.         FREE        FREE     FREE      FREE       FREE    FREE
Thanks fer goin to all the trouble. Those dimensions, (and I hate to admit it) are a little tight. Next vehicle will be larger. Dang!
Percher....if it's still available i will take it off your hands  Cheers  Craig  PM coming to you
Sandbag was the first to send a p.m so its all yours.I sent you a p.m
Very nice gesture Percher, that's what it's all about !!  Awesome stuff !!!!
Nice score Sandbag.  May the floor get slick with lots of fish slime!!!  And darn nice of ya, Percher.  Sounds like you got yourself a nice new ride, too.
